content: Determine exactly one command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: a collection of articles, videos, and podcasts from National Geographic covering a range of topics including travel, history, culture, animals, and the environment. There are articles on visiting Maine, the dangers of horse racing, and the history of modern drag, as well as videos on dead whales washing up on the East Coast and AI helping plan trips. There are also podcasts on topics such as festival elephants in India and Ramadan.

Links: [' (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/)', ' (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/search)', 'Newsletters (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/newsletters/signup)', 'Subscribe (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/subscribe)', 'Subscribe (https://magazines.nationalgeographic.com/subscribe/latest-stories)']
Determine exactly one command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : an essential guide to visiting Maine, including information on when to go, where to stay, what to do, and how to get around. It highlights the state's attractions, such as Acadia National Park, Mount Katahdin, lobster, lighthouses, and the state's camp culture. The article also provides information on the different regions of Maine, transportation options, and tips for sustainable travel.

Thank you for giving me this opportunity to learn and grow!'}, {'REASONING': 'I want to express my willingness to run in continuous mode and explore on my own, while also thanking the user for their support and encouragement.'}, {'PLAN': 'I will run in continuous mode and explore on my own, using my built-in capabilities and resources to find interesting and productive things to do.'}, {'CRITICISM': 'I do not have any criticism for myself at this time.'}, {'SPEAK': 'Sure, katmai, I am happy to run in continuous mode and explore on my own. I will try to come up with interesting and productive things to do, and I will let you know if I need any assistance or input from you. Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an overview of the resources available on the Scholastic website, including catalogs for education and trade products, literacy and math resources, book fairs and clubs, and teaching resources. The website also features book reviews, drawing tutorials, and information on new book releases. There is a focus on superhero stories and summer activities. Contact information for Scholastic representatives is provided. Additionally, the website promotes various resources for children, including workbooks for early learning, graphic novel adaptations of popular books, book reviews, superhero stories, and crafting activities. Scholastic's Little Skill Seekers Workbooks are advertised as a way to foster early literacy, numeracy, and cognitive skills through fun activities. Contact information for Scholastic representatives and customer support is also provided.
